title: syscall: mksyscall_windows.go should generate code for non-syscall packages
body:
mksyscall_windows.go generates code for syscall package only. Old mksyscall_windows.pl
script used to generate code for any package. mksyscall_windows.go should do the same.

From https://groups.google.com/forum/#!msg/golang-dev/gyOoSwxBkCA/2octbQGsL7EJ

"...  I understand the perl script has been ported to Go, but last I checked it was
still focused only on generating code for syscall. ..."

Alex
